page.title: 03 Employment in Keith
page.content: The main sources of employment in Keith are the wool mills and the distilleries.There are three whisky distilleries in Keith-Strathisla, Glenkeith and Strathmill.My brother Paul,works as a stock checker.His job is to check all the warehouses in the Keith area to see that the casks of whisky are all secure and that nothing is missing.Another friend who works in a distillery is Michael Donald.His job is rolling the casks onto lorries which take the spirit away to be blended or bottled.Some distilleries in the local aea are being closed down because of a drop in the demand for whisky. There are two wool mills in Keith - Kynochs and Laidlaws.Mr.and Mrs.Donald both work in Kynochs Mills.Mr.Donald works as a spinner and his wife works in the "Web Dept." checking for loose threads in the cloth.
